title: No response from server (At login screen)
body: When I try to log in, it always says "Did not receive response from server (attempting reconnect). I have already tried doing the DNS thing and checked my firewall but have not found any helpful solutions.

replies.body:
I understand you have changed your DNS settings but if you have not already please change your settings to googles DNS server at 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4 then try the following steps:


- Flush your local machines DNS cache by opening a command prompt and typing in the following command minus the quotation marks :
           "ipconfig /flushdns"

- restart your computer for the DNS flush to take affect
- try League again

 If that didn't work:

- Right click the league of legends icon on your desktop and click properties then navigate to the compatibility tab, click run this program in compatibility mode making sure you set the drop down menu to the operating system you are running, also click run this program as an administrator and hit apply
- Try running the Program again
 
If that did not work:

- download and install the free version of Ccleaner from (http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download) 
- Uninstall League of Legends
- navigate to where ever league of legends was installed and delete any files that may have been left behind (default location "C:/Riot Games") 
- open Ccleaner, go to the Registry tab, click scan for issues then fix issues, (the program will ask if you want to make a backup of your registry if you would like to then go ahead if not then hit no and continue) 
- Repeat the previous step until Ccleaner finds no issues with your registry 
- download a new copy of league of legends and install it

If none of those worked then let me know and I'll try to think of something else you can try
Whenever I get that message, If i open Internet explorer, it loads. Try that.
Nothinng on there worked for me :/ any other things i can try?

Hey there! I was having similar issues not to long ago and before I post this I check the status of all the Server's and see nothing wrong as of right now. Have you happened to try the Connection KB that Riot has to offer? The link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I'll be on for a bit so I can try and help you out if this doesn't happen to work for you. {{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
